/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red and white facades standing out against the blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.
